reviews.review: This game is good for you if you are looking to get assraped by russians, asians or cheaters. This game has given me mental illnesses such as scizophrenia and all those funny things. I cry myself to sleep every night after playing this satanic game. I had to get help from suicide hotline not to kill myself because of the forsaken russians. This game is not for everyone, please dont play this game if you are cheating, russian or your name is ling long ching chong related. Also your mental health should be better than in amnesia the dark decent. Also you need to be very good with your mouse movement. Please send help
This just ain't it, but at least now I know how to speak Russian.
